sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react" import { useParams, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' const PostPage = () => { const params = useParams() const data = [ { id: 1, displayName: 'John Doe', createdAt: '2020-01-01', content: 'day la bai dang mau', likes: 0, comments: 0, }, { id: 2, displayName: 'John Doe', createdAt: '2020-01-01', content: 'day la bai dang mau', likes: 0, comments: 0, }, { id: 3, displayName: 'John Doe', createdAt: '2020-01-01', content: 'day la bai dang mau', likes: 0, comments: 0, }, { id: 4, displayName: 'John Doe', createdAt: '2020-01-01', content: 'day la bai dang mau', likes: 0, comments: 0, } ] const id = params.id const post = data.find(item => item.id === Number(id)) return (
{post.displayName}

{post.createdAt}

{post.content}

{post.likes}

) } export default PostPage
